de.thm.mni.nn.perceptron.impl

Class Pattern

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.thm.mni.nn.perceptron.impl.Pattern

  • public class Pattern
extends java.lang.Object
    A Pattern Object is used to Propagate or to Train a Perceptron. A Pattern has a given Input and Output Values. To propagate a Perceptron with a given Pattern, the pattern has to match the Perceptron. This means the number of input and Output values in the Pattern has to match the number of Input and Output Neurons in the Perceptron.
    Author:
    Alexander Schulz
